lead_paragraph: Two Americans — Jozy Altidore, 18, and Giuseppe Rossi, 21 — scored goals in a Spanish league game Saturday, helping Villarreal to a 4-1 victory at Athletic Bilbao. Rossi scored the opening goal, and Altidore, who entered the match in the final minutes, converted a pass for his first goal in league play.
